mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysShopBrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ SHOP_ID , ERP_BRND_ID , DLV_SHOP_YN , DLV_SHOP_FEE_SECT_CD , DLV_SHOP_FEE_AMT , DLV_SHOP_FEE_RT , PKUP_SHOP_YN , PKUP_SHOP_FEE_SECT_CD , PKUP_SHOP_FEE_AMT , PKUP_SHOP_FEE_RT , PKUP_SHOP_LGS_FEE_SECT_CD , PKUP_SHOP_LGS_FEE_AMT , PKUP_SHOP_LGS_FEE_RT , QDLV_SHOP_YN , RTGOD_SHOP_YN , EXCHG_SHOP_YN , REPAIR_SHOP_YN , USE_YN , SAFE_INV_USE_YN , SAFE_INV_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_SHOP_BRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ERP_BRND_ID = #{erpBrndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
